html: Today a memorial was laid to mark 75 years to the day a Halifax crew crashed and perished at RAF #Tangmere - just missing our tower! it was marked by family members and partners at @MuseumTangmere with Fr. html: We've been talking to residents, and lots of people in Chichester district didn't know they could put glass into their household recycling bins - but we'd love to have it! text: We've been talking to residents, and lots of people in Chichester district didn't know they could put glass into their household recycling bins - but we'd love to have it! html: 1950 on the left: Global life expectancy was 46 years. In Africa the average was 36 In India 35 years 2015 on the right: Global life expectancy is 71 years. In Africa it is 61 (same as Japan in 1950) In India it is 68 (close to the healthiest country in 1950 – Norway with 72)pic.twitter.com/7mtheYLsXK
text:
1950 on the left:
Global life expectancy was 46 years.
In Africa the average was 36
In India 35 years

2015 on the right:
Global life expectancy is 71 years.
In Africa it is 61 (same as Japan in 1950)
In India it is 68 (close to the healthiest country in 1950 – Norway with 72)pic.twitter.com/7mtheYLsXK

html: A happy 75th anniversary to 617 Squadron, The Dambusters. It’s creation, in 1943, epitomises the very best of British in invention, leadership, daring, bravery and sacrifice. #RAF100 #dambusters75pic.twitter.com/0Ef2ehAQoQ
